GTPB Courses

GTPB/IBB21 Introduction to Scripting

Course Description

Learning objectives

  1. Day 1, Intro to Bioinformatics, Sequence Data, RNA-seq
  2. Day 2, Handling Sequence Data, RNA-seq
  3. Day 3, Variant Calling / Single Cell RNA-seq
  4. Day 4, Single Cell RNA-seq
  5. Day 5, Using Scripts to Automate Bioinformatics Data Analysis

Instructors

  • Pedro Fernandes
  • Jingtao Lilue
  • Ricardo Leite
